flocker 0.1-0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Fitting occupancy models with flocker

Reference

All functions

calc_log_lik_partial()

Compute the part of the log-likelihood relating to sampling events. To be used internally in log_lik_V(). Missing events are returned as 0s

example_flocker_data()

Create example data for use with make_flocker_data() and downstream functions.

fitted_flocker()

Get expected values of the posterior predictive distribution for the occupancy component, the detection component, or both. Note that in the case of the detection component, you are conditioning on occupancy being 1. Note that these are values for a hypothetical set of unit covariates rather than the ones actually observed (some of which are known to be occupied, when Q == 1).

flock()

Fit an occupancy model

get_Z()

Get posterior distribution of Z matrix

get_positions_V()

Get matrix positions corresponding to each row of data in rep-varying flocker_fit

is_flocker_fit()

Test whether an object is of class flocker_fit

log1m_inv_logit()

Numerically stable log one-minus inverse logit

log_inv_logit()

Numerically stable log inverse logit

log_lik_V()

Compute unitwise log-likelihood matrix for a rep-varying flocker_fit object

log_lik_occupancy_C()

A log-likelihood function for the rep-constant occupancy model, sufficient for brms::loo(vc_fit) to work.

loo_compare_flocker()

LOO comparisons for flocker models.

loo_flocker()

Compute loo for flocker_fit objects

loo_flocker_onefit()

Compute loo for a single flocker_fit object

make_flocker_data()

Format data for flocker().

make_occupancy_C_lpmf()

Create Stan code for likelihood function occupancy_C_lpmf for rep-constant model. Primarily for internal use in flock(). The purpose of defining this custom family, rather than using brms's zero-inflated binomial, is to ensure that the occupancy parameters are interpretable as though values of 1 in the marginalized state reflect occupancy rather than non- occupancy.

make_occupancy_V_lpmf()

Create Stan code for likelihood function occupancy_V_lpmf for rep-varying model. Primarily for internal use in flock().

occupancy_C()

Define the rep-constant occupancy family Primarily for internal use in flock().

occupancy_C_lpmf()

An R implementation of the rep constant lpmf without the binomial coefficient

occupancy_C_lpmf_with_coef()

An R implementation of occupancy_C_lpmf including the binomial coefficient. Not currently in use.

occupancy_V()

Define the rep-varying occupancy family Primarily for internal use in flock().

predict_flocker()

Get posterior predictions from a flocker model

type_flocker_fit()

Extract lik_type from object of class flocker_fit
